title: Berjg vs Faker MSI
body: who do you think will win? no doubt berjg has been owning the lcs scene and well when hasnt faker been a monster? i really am wondering who will win berjg has improved allot and they did win iem and i think are allot better then they were at worlds last year thoughts?

replies.body: Neither, I think Easyhoon will face Bjergsen before Faker does and wipe the floor with him.

> [{quoted}](name=Maliginant,realm=NA,application-id=9hBQwnEU,discussion-id=LLMUs2qR,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2015-05-02T20:55:50.093+0000)
>
> Neither, I think Easyhoon will face Bjergsen before Faker does and wipe the floor with him.

I not sure why they are bringing Easyhoon ether. He looks like a good mid laner. Overall he didn't look that great.
cinderhulk didnt come out till 5.5? so that means right before the tank junglers which G.E was doing great on
yeah but you guys gotta remeber tsm>team WE> GE and GE was owning KR on this patch too

IEM was on 5.4. MSI will be on 5.7.
GE Lost most of their games this season after Cinderhulk patch.

Will faker even play?

EDIT: It's not really going to be Faker vs. Bjerg. It's going to be TSM vs. SK T and TSM is probably the better team this year.

Uh... Idk about that. People are still on the Faker train, and yes; he is that good but so is their adc Bang. Easyhoon is particularly problematic because he is much better at aoe mages ({{champion:69}} {{champion:115}} {{champion:101}} } than Faker and he is also nearly as good as Faker so SKT's team comps can flip 360 depending on who is playing. 

Bang pretty close to solo carried a game where SKT should have got hard outscaled.

Fortunately for tsm, Lustboy is probably the better support, Santorin is the stronger jungler, and I think TSM is slightly ahead in terms of tactics. SKT still has the option of brute force win by pure skill if either Bang or Faker/Easyhoon get fed.
tsm won iem cause tigers basically shit the bed. Faker wins that match easily imo.
Faker hands down, bjerg practices against NA... i would just like to see bjerg play against fakers lb
Thats if it doesn't get banned every game.
SK T will field Easyhoon bcause they're insane, giving TSM the upset victory.
